topics.body:
I just thought of something funny and when it eventually reaches retrospect it will make a lot of people angry and a lot of people's sides exploding from laughter.

Most of the world's porn comes from the usa right?  Most of the world's video games are developed in the usa right?  Most of the world's geeky stuff, minus anime and manga, originates from the usa right?  Most of the world's fandoms or such originates from the usa right?

It's going to be funny in say ten years when the vast majority of the world has access to the internet.

The reason why I say this is that the reason why it's going to be hilarious is that there will be a incredibly large demand for such things, but at the same time accusing the usa of "corrupting" their country's morals.

2025 Uganda or such, "Stop corrupting our country with gay porn! (secretly on the internet) please don't stop making gay porn"
